And where do i start with the mods? THERE IS A MOD FOR EVERYTHING!!!!!!!! And they are easy to install using the steam workshop. (If only minecraft mods were this simple.The only annoying thing is it doens't have natural disasters. (However there is a Tsunami mod).10/10 for everything.
